Package gw.api.exception

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HasErrorInfo
    This interface is only valid for exceptions, this is a flag interface indicating that any implementing class has error information that can be extracted.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ErrorDetail
    This class contains detail error information.
    ErrorInfo
    This class is the container for error information, it's basically an ErrorDetail with additional information for turning the error into a response, either soap fault or http response.
    MessageFragment
    This class represents the information needed to create a message, or to explicitly set the message string.
    Property
    This class contains information about individual properties on a message fragment, error detail, or error info.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Property.SpecialHandling
    This enumeration defines special handling of properties to messages.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ExternalizableException
    This class represents an exception that is primarily intended for an external consumer (a webservice or servlet client) and provides failure information that the external consumer may find useful.
    GWIllegalArgumentException
    This class is a Guidewire replacement for java.lang.IllegalArgumentException.
